cause.description:
A group soley dedicated to rap and its survival...
1. Listen to my songs on www.soundclick.com/aintshitfreesownlck
2. Murder D4L and dem franchise boys for killin hip hop....
3. enjoy the shit while under the influence of drugs...lmao deuces
cause.mission: listen to and/or make better rap music...
cause.name: Better Hip hop and Rap...
